faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Approximately 285 kcal for a standard slice.

faqs.q: What are the macros for one slice of pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: About 35 g carbs, 12 g protein, 12 g fat.

faqs.q: Is pepperoni pizza high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, one slice has around 700 mg sodium due to cheese and processed meat.

faqs.q: How does crust type affect calories in pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Thin crust reduces calories by ~50 kcal per slice; deep dish adds ~100 kcal.

faqs.q: Are there healthier tweaks for pepperoni pizza calories?
faqs.a: Opt for veggie toppings or thin crust to lower calories while keeping flavor.
